res.rBody:
Sicut mater
consolatur consolator
filios suos filio suo ita consolabor vos dicit dominus et de Jerusalem
civitate quam elegi civitatem quam elegi veniet vobis auxilium et videbitis et gaudebit cor vestrum

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R Cdm Bat

verses.vBody: Deus a Libano veniet et sanctus de monte umbroso et condenso

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Hyd Alb2 Evm Mch Ely Wor Wcb

verses.vBody: Dabo in Sion salutem et in Jerusalem gloriam meam

rep.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-R Mch Bat
CAO-G CAO-H CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Hyd Alb2 Evm Ely Wor Wcb
